metadata.title: CVE-2017-9753 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The versados_mkobject function in bfd/versados.c in the Binary FileDescriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.28,does not initialize a certain data structure, which allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (buffer overflow and application crash) orpossibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted binary file, asdemonstrated by mishandling of this file during "objdump -D" execution.

criterions.comment: binutils package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
